options.content: Virtual Machine
Storage Account
Key Vault

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Healthy" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Percentage CPU' THEN value END) AS "Percentage CPU",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Available Memory Percentage' THEN value END) AS "Available Memory Percentage",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'VmAvailabilityMetric' THEN value END) AS "VmAvailabilityMetric",
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group,
    subscription_name,
    resource_type
FROM 
    public.metrics
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
)
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' and severity = 0;

SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Healthy" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cpu_percent' THEN value END) AS "CPU %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'memory_percent' THEN value END) AS "Memory %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'storage_percent' THEN value END) AS "Storage %",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'is_db_alive' THEN value END) AS "DB Alive",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'connections_failed' THEN value END) AS "Conn Failed", 	
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'deadlocks' THEN value END) AS "Dead Locks", 	
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group,
    subscription_name,
    resource_type
FROM 
    public.metrics
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
)
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers' and severity = 0;

SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Healthty" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cpu_percent' THEN value END) AS "CPU %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'memory_percent' THEN value END) AS "Memory %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'storage_percent' THEN value END) AS "Storage %",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'aborted_connections' THEN value END) AS "Aborted Conn", 	
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group,
    subscription_name,
    resource_type
FROM 
    public.metrics
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
)
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers' and severity = 0;

SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Healthy" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'percentProcessorTime' THEN value END) AS "CPU %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'usedmemorypercentage' THEN value END) AS "Memory %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'serverLoad' THEN value END) AS "Server Load %",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'errors' THEN value END) AS "Errors", 	
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group,
    subscription_name,
    resource_type
FROM 
    public.metrics
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
)
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.cache/redis' and severity = 0;

SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Healthy" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Availability' THEN value END) AS "Availability %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'UsedCapacity' THEN value END) AS "Used Capacity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SuccessE2ELatency' THEN value END) AS "E2E Latency",
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group,
    subscription_name,
    resource_type
FROM 
    public.metrics
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
)
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts' and severity = 0;

SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Healthy" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Availability' THEN value END) AS "Availability %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SaturationShoebox' THEN value END) AS "Capacity Used %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'ServiceApiLatency' THEN value END) AS "Service API Latency (ms)",
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group,
    subscription_name,
    resource_type
FROM 
    public.metrics
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
)
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults' and severity = 0;

SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Critical" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Percentage CPU' THEN value END) AS "Percentage CPU",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Available Memory Percentage' THEN value END) AS "Available Memory Percentage",

)

(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,

    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'usedmemorypercentage' THEN value END) AS "Memory %",

FROM

GROUP BY

)
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.cache/redis' and severity = 2;

SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Critical" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Availability' THEN value END) AS "Availability %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'UsedCapacity' THEN value END) AS "Used Capacity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SuccessE2ELatency' THEN value END) AS "E2E Latency",
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group,

    resource_type
FROM 
    public.metrics
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
)

SELECT COUNT(resource_name) AS "Critical" FROM 
(
SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as severity,
    resource_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Availability' THEN value END) AS "Availability %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SaturationShoebox' THEN value END) AS "Capacity Used %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'ServiceApiLatency' THEN value END) AS "Service API Latency (ms)",
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group,
    subscription_name,
    resource_type
FROM 
    public.metrics
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
)
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults' and severity = 2;

SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as "Severity",
    resource_name as "Resource Name",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Percentage CPU' THEN severity END) AS "Percentage CPU Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Percentage CPU' THEN value END) AS "Percentage CPU",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Available Memory Percentage' THEN severity END) AS "Available Memory % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Available Memory Percentage' THEN value END) AS "Available Memory %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'VmAvailabilityMetric' THEN severity END) AS "Availability Severity",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'VmAvailabilityMetric' THEN value END) AS "Availability",
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group as "Resource Group",
    subscription_name as "Subscription",
    subscription_id as "Subscription ID"
FROM 
    public.metrics
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, subscription_id, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
ORDER BY
    "Severity" DESC;

SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as "Severity",
    resource_name as "Resource Name",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cpu_percent' THEN severity END) AS "CPU % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cpu_percent' THEN value END) AS "CPU %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'memory_percent' THEN severity END) AS "Memory % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'memory_percent' THEN value END) AS "Memory %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'storage_percent' THEN severity END) AS "Storage % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'storage_percent' THEN value END) AS "Storage %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'is_db_alive' THEN severity END) AS "DB Alive Severity",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'is_db_alive' THEN value END) AS "DB Alive",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'connections_failed' THEN severity END) AS "Conn Failed Severity",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'connections_failed' THEN value END) AS "Conn Failed", 	
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'deadlocks' THEN severity END) AS "Dead Locks Severity",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'deadlocks' THEN value END) AS "Dead Locks", 	
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group as "Resource Group",
    subscription_name as "Subscription",
    subscription_id as "Subscription ID"
FROM 
    public.metrics
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers'
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, subscription_id, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
ORDER BY
    "Severity" DESC;

SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as "Severity",
    resource_name as "Resource Name",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cpu_percent' THEN severity END) AS "CPU % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cpu_percent' THEN value END) AS "CPU %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'memory_percent' THEN severity END) AS "Memory % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'memory_percent' THEN value END) AS "Memory %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'storage_percent' THEN severity END) AS "Storage % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'storage_percent' THEN value END) AS "Storage %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'aborted_connections' THEN severity END) AS "Aborted Conn Severity",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'aborted_connections' THEN value END) AS "Aborted Conn", 	
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group as "Resource Group",
    subscription_name as "Subscription",
    subscription_id as "Subscription ID"
FROM 
    public.metrics
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers'
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, subscription_id, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
ORDER BY
    "Severity" DESC;

SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as "Severity",
    resource_name as "Resource Name",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'percentProcessorTime' THEN severity END) AS "CPU % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'percentProcessorTime' THEN value END) AS "CPU %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'usedmemorypercentage' THEN severity END) AS "Memory % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'usedmemorypercentage' THEN value END) AS "Memory %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'serverLoad' THEN severity END) AS "Server Load % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'serverLoad' THEN value END) AS "Server Load %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'errors' THEN severity END) AS "Errors Severity",
 	MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'errors' THEN value END) AS "Errors", 	
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group as "Resource Group",
    subscription_name as "Subscription",
    subscription_id as "Subscription ID"
FROM 
    public.metrics
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.cache/redis'
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, subscription_id, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
ORDER BY
    "Severity" DESC;

SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as "Severity",
    resource_name as "Resource Name",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Availability' THEN severity END) AS "Availability % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Availability' THEN value END) AS "Availability %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SuccessE2ELatency' THEN severity END) AS "E2E Latency Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SuccessE2ELatency' THEN value END) AS "E2E Latency (ms)",    
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'UsedCapacity' THEN severity END) AS "Used Capacity Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'UsedCapacity' THEN value END) AS "Used Capacity (bytes)",
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group as "Resource Group",
    subscription_name as "Subscription",
    subscription_id as "Subscription ID"
FROM 
    public.metrics
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts'
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, subscription_id, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
ORDER BY
    "Severity" DESC;

SELECT 
	MAX(severity) as "Severity",
    resource_name as "Resource Name",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Availability' THEN severity END) AS "Availability % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Availability' THEN value END) AS "Availability %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SaturationShoebox' THEN severity END) AS "Capacity Used % Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SaturationShoebox' THEN value END) AS "Capacity Used %",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'ServiceApiLatency' THEN severity END) AS "Service API Latency Severity",
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'ServiceApiLatency' THEN value END) AS "Service API Latency (ms)",
    MAX(metric_date) as "Metric Date",
    resource_group as "Resource Group",
    subscription_name as "Subscription",
    subscription_id as "Subscription ID"
FROM 
    public.metrics
WHERE resource_type = 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults'
GROUP BY 
    subscription_name, subscription_id, resource_group, resource_type, resource_name
ORDER BY
    "Severity" DESC;
